DataElement.preferredName: Tumor/Lesion Identification Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Lesion Present At Diagnosis Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indicator that specifies whether or not lesion is present at diagnosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tumor/Lesion Identification Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Lesion Present At Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the tumor/lesion identification domain.:A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time._Used to indicate position, location, or state._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the tumor/lesion identification domain.

Concepts.definition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the tumor/lesion identification domain.

Property.preferredDefinition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time._Used to indicate position, location, or state._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.
Used to indicate position, location, or state.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
